stops.title: My Birth & Rajshahi
stops.subtitle: Beside the Padma River
body: I was born in Rajshahi. It was a rural area, and my homeland was a beautiful place beside the Padma river.
This is the beginning of everything ‚Äî quiet mornings, wide skies, and a deep attachment to home.

stops.title: School Life
stops.subtitle: Govt Laboratory High School
body: School life was one of my best times. I made a lot of friends there.
I was once a regional runner-up in a Math Olympiad ‚Äî one of those moments that made me believe I could do hard things.

stops.title: College Admission Stress
stops.subtitle: The BUET regret
body: The admission phase was full of stress ‚Äî I couldn‚Äôt get into the best college in my city.
Despite that, I cracked BUET. But my father didn‚Äôt let me enroll because the subject available for me (IPE) wasn‚Äôt to his liking.
I still regret not joining BUET.

stops.title: RUET Life
stops.subtitle: Learning to fit in
body: I got admitted to RUET and struggled a lot to fit in at first.
Over time, I learned how to survive pressure, keep showing up, and grow into my own pace.

stops.title: RAPL
stops.subtitle: Where I truly fit in
body: RAPL is where I finally felt like I belonged. I found amazing people ‚Äî met Nafis, Shoikat, Rithik.
We participated in IUPCs and ICPCs and learned how to improve together.

stops.title: RAPL Seniors
stops.subtitle: Adopted (in the best way)
body: The seniors were the most lovely people. They took me in like they adopted me.
They taught me the art of problem solving ‚Äî not just tricks, but thinking.

stops.title: RAPL Juniors
stops.subtitle: Lovely kids
body: The juniors were lovely ‚Äî they respected me a lot and kept the environment warm and fun.
It felt good to become someone who could help others the same way seniors helped me.

stops.title: Vivasoft
stops.subtitle: Industrial Trainee (Apprenticeship)
body: Completed a 12-day mentor-led MERN attachment; built the SellSense MVP.
Tech: Next.js/Redux, Express REST APIs, MongoDB + LangChain-based summarization.
Worked with Git/GitHub, Husky hooks, and Postman for validation.

stops.title: Side Quests
stops.subtitle: Codebook ‚Ä¢ SellSense ‚Ä¢ Blog Agency
body: Codebook App ‚Äî Flutter snippet manager with Firebase sync, AI assistant (Groq), and PDF export.
SellSense ‚Äî LangChain prototype to summarize buyer‚Äìseller chats into structured records.
Blog-Agency-App ‚Äî MERN dashboard with role-aware CRUD and RESTful API backed by MongoDB.

stops.title: (Empty House)
stops.subtitle: Will be added later
body: This house is intentionally empty.
Future story drop will live here.

stops.title: Going Abroad
stops.subtitle: No news so far
body: Plan: go abroad for higher studies / bigger opportunities.
No confirmed updates yet ‚Äî this house will evolve when life updates arrive.

stops.title: More Future Plans
stops.subtitle: My next levels
body: Become a stronger engineer: ship end-to-end without fear.
Build tools for developers (and maybe a tiny startup).
Keep competitive programming as a lifelong skill gym.
Give back: mentoring juniors, writing, and open-source.
